sootychimneys.midnightconfig.title: Sooty Chimneys
sootychimneys.midnightconfig.smokeStreng: Chance of the smoke particle to spawn. 1.0 - full. 0.0 - no smoke.
sootychimneys.midnightconfig.dirtyChance:
Chimneys get dirty when a random tick occurs. (Chimney must be working (LIT) and not 'BLOCKED'.)
and when random tick occurs - this value controls the chance of a chimney becoming dirty.
1.0 - dirty on first random tick.
0.0 - chimney will never get dirty.
sootychimneys.midnightconfig.windEnabled: Enable/disable wind effect on smoke particles.
sootychimneys.midnightconfig.windStrengt: How much effect wind has on the smoke.
